text: "En riktig jävla schlager" is a song written by Kjell Jennstig, Leif Goldkuhl and Henrik Dorsin, and performed by Ravaillacz during Melodifestivalen 2013, where the song ended up 10th. The song charted at Svensktoppen for five weeks. before leaving the chart. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (2013) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} == References == Category:2013 singles Category:Melodifestivalen songs of 2013 Category:Swedish-language songs Category:Songs written by Kjell Jennstig Category:2013 songs
title: En riktig jävla schlager
